接口 KnowledgeMapper

所有超级接口:
com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper<Knowledge>, com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.Mapper<Knowledge>
public interface KnowledgeMapper extends com.baomidou.mybatisplus.core.mapper.BaseMapper<Knowledge>
知识库数据访问层

  • 方法详细资料

    • selectByCategoryId

      @Select("SELECT * FROM knowledge WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND deleted = 0") List<Knowledge> selectByCategoryId(@Param("categoryId") Long categoryId)
      根据分类ID查询知识列表

    • selectByTag

      @Select("SELECT * FROM knowledge WHERE tags LIKE CONCAT('%',#{tag},'%') AND deleted = 0") List<Knowledge> selectByTag(@Param("tag") String tag)
      根据标签查询知识列表

    • selectByAuthorId

      @Select("SELECT * FROM knowledge WHERE author_id = #{authorId} AND deleted = 0") List<Knowledge> selectByAuthorId(@Param("authorId") Long authorId)
      根据作者ID查询知识列表

    • incrementViewCount

      @Select("UPDATE knowledge SET view_count = view_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}") void incrementViewCount(@Param("id") Long id)
      增加浏览次数

    • incrementLikeCount

      @Select("UPDATE knowledge SET like_count = like_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}") void incrementLikeCount(@Param("id") Long id)
      增加点赞次数

    • incrementFavoriteCount

      @Select("UPDATE knowledge SET favorite_count = favorite_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}") void incrementFavoriteCount(@Param("id") Long id)
      增加收藏次数

    • decrementLikeCount

      @Select("UPDATE knowledge SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND like_count > 0") void decrementLikeCount(@Param("id") Long id)
      减少点赞次数

    • decrementFavoriteCount

      @Select("UPDATE knowledge SET favorite_count = favorite_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND favorite_count > 0") void decrementFavoriteCount(@Param("id") Long id)
      减少收藏次数

    • countByType

      @Select("SELECT type, COUNT(*) as count FROM knowledge WHERE deleted = 0 GROUP BY type") List<Map<String,Object>> countByType()
      统计各类型知识数量

    • countByStatus

      @Select("SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM knowledge WHERE deleted = 0 GROUP BY status") List<Map<String,Object>> countByStatus()
      统计各状态知识数量

    • countByDepartment

      @Select("SELECT department_id, COUNT(*) as count FROM knowledge WHERE deleted = 0 GROUP BY department_id") List<Map<String,Object>> countByDepartment()
      统计部门知识数量

    • countByTimeRange

      @Select("SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m') as month, COUNT(*) as count FROM knowledge WHERE deleted = 0 AND create_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time,'%Y-%m')") List<Map<String,Object>> countByTimeRange(LocalDateTime startTime, LocalDateTime endTime)
      统计时间段内的知识数量
